name: Surfin
body:
### Description
This R package computes standard error estimates for random forest predictions using a fast re-implementation of random forests in Rcpp. Two kinds of standard error estimates provided: U-statistics based and infinitesimal jackknife.

### Latest Version
v0.0.0.9000, under development

### Installation
Package not yet on CRAN. For now, download from this website the .zip (if you are on Windows) or .tar.gz (if you are on Mac / Linux) then type the following in R:
```
$ install.packages(path_to_downloaded_file, repos=NULL)
```

### Authors and Contributors
Sarah Tan @shftan, David Miller @d-miller, Giles Hooker, Lucas Mentch, Stefan Wager @swager

### Maintainer
Questions, bug reports, etc.? http://github.com/shftan/surfin/issues
[Note: link not yet live as of June 3, 2015]
